stanzas: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you. And I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh. And I will give you a heart of flesh.

And I will put my spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes. And ye shall keep my judgments and do them, and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God. And they shall know that I am the Lord.
A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you. And I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh. And I will give you a heart of flesh.

And I will put my spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes. And ye shall keep my judgments and do them, and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God. And they shall know that I am the Lord.
